attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: due to the disgusting behaviour of some mp's over the expenses row, it must be time to disolve parliament to allow voters to replace their mp's who thay may feel have let them down so very badly.  surley a general election will give us all a chance to remove who we feel have let us down, anf mp's who have done nothing wrong will have nothing to fear.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
